rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Lemour Inn, where
trading merchants come to rest, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0002
rows.name: I'd like to rest for a bit.

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Thank you very much, mo.
We have a room available, mo!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0103
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] It's completely different from sleeping
in the hut on Gramps's back...

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0104
rows.name: For some reason, I feel a little stronger, too...

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0105
rows.name: Alright, it's about time I headed to the meeting place!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0106
rows.name: It was at the Goldmund Departure Port, right?

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0107
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling ]Be careful, and have a safe
trip, mo!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0201
rows.name: Actually, I think I'll rest a little later.

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0202
rows.name:
Understood, mo!
We'll be waiting, mo!
